name: letsencrypt-heroku
description: Let's make all of Heroku secure.

HEROKU_OAUTH_KEY.description: A valid OAuth key to access your Heroku appications.

AUTH_TOKEN.description: A random token to authenticate all requests to the API. Treat this like a password.

CONTACT_EMAIL.description: A contact email address for LetsEncrypt to inform of revokcations and expirations.
